channel.name: Convert HL7 to FHIR Patient - Example 2

com.mirth.connect.plugins.messagebuilder.name: Convert HL7 v2.x message to FHIR Patient resource

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

codeTemplateLibrary.name: HL7 v2.x to FHIR Creation Functions
codeTemplateLibrary.description:
These code templates serve as an example of how to dynamically build FHIR resources and convert from other formats such as HL7 v2.x.
Some of the code templates in this library are dependent on other code templates from the "HL7 v2.x to FHIR Helper Functions" library.

codeTemplateLibrary.name: HL7 v2.x to FHIR Helper Functions
codeTemplateLibrary.description:
General functions to help convert HL7 v2.x to FHIR resources.
These are used by the example HL7 to FHIR transformer, as well as the "HL7 v2.x to FHIR Creation Functions" code template library.
